name: In Plain Sight (itch) (Embrace The Code, abessive, celisea, elven corpse, Critical Fish)

description:
Controls:
[W] [A] [S] [D] -> move

[E] -> interact
[Spacebar] -> jump

[Shift] -> dash

Download the game to have a more optimal experience!
